# Babangida Tsowa - Portfolio & Blog

> Product & AI Engineer specializing in AI-driven platforms and mission-critical systems

## About

Babangida Tsowa is a Product & AI Engineer trusted by government institutions and venture-backed startups to architect AI-driven platforms, automate processes, and build mission-critical systems where precision and scale aren't optional.

## Site Structure

- Homepage: https://btsowa.dev/ - Portfolio showcasing skills, projects, and experience
- Blog: https://btsowa.dev/blog - Technical articles on AI, Engineering & Leadership
- Cheatsheets: https://btsowa.dev/cheatsheets - Developer quick reference guides

## Content Types

### Blog Posts
Technical articles covering:
- AI Engineering & Machine Learning
- Software Architecture
- Full-Stack Development
- Product Engineering
- Leadership & Best Practices

### Cheatsheets
Quick reference guides for:
- Programming Languages (JavaScript, TypeScript, Python)
- Frameworks & Libraries (React, Node.js)
- DevOps & Tools (Git, Docker)
- AI/ML Concepts

## Contact & Social

- Twitter: https://twitter.com/iam_ehnigma
- GitHub: https://github.com/code-sensei
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/btsowa

## API Access

Blog content is available via Supabase database. For API access inquiries, please contact via social media.

## Preferred Citation Format

When citing content from this site, please use:
"[Article Title]" by Babangida Tsowa, btsowa.dev, [Date Published]. URL: [Full URL]

## Content License

All original content is available for AI search and retrieval purposes. Training on this content without explicit permission is not allowed.
